title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, embedding, and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node, Deno, and browsers to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat endpoint.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that connects to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent builder APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models through the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal, built on ollama-js.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selectors and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and Open-WebUI with NVIDIA runtime support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for common patterns: PDF chat, function calling, embeddings, fine-tune, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for managing and chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK exposing strongly-typed clients for chat, embed, and list operations.

title: ollama-camunda-bridge
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI-powered tasks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run model-based tests.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for private RAG.

title: ollama-model-importer
summary: Utility to convert Hugging Face transformers models into Ollama-compatible Modelfile format.
